entity.name: Account

integer.name: commonPosition
integer.title: Common position
integer.help: Field allowing to alert the user when, during manual input of a move line, the user inputs an amount in a different position compared to the usual for this account

many-to-one.name: defaultTax
many-to-one.title: Default tax
many-to-one.help: Field allowing to fill automaticaly, during manual input of a move line and when the accounting account is selected, the tax field. Selected tax can be replaced depending on the fiscal position of the partner and the company linked to the move

boolean.name: analyticDistributionRequiredOnInvoiceLines
boolean.title: Analytic distribution required on invoice lines

boolean.name: analyticDistributionRequiredOnMoveLines
boolean.title: Analytic distribution required on move lines

many-to-one.name: serviceType
many-to-one.title: Service type
many-to-one.help: Field exported in DAS2 declaration. If this field is empty, this account won't appear in DAS2 reports and exports.

many-to-one.name: analyticDistributionTemplate
many-to-one.title: Analytic Distribution Template
many-to-one.help: This analytical distribution will be used by default when entering invoice lines or entries as soon as this accounting account is selected.
